 the fog's depth factor.

flyVector fogcolor
 the fog's color.

int fogmode
 flag for debug purposes (0: normal fog, 1: light map pixels affected by the fog are painted).

Detailed Description

Box fog class.

This class implements a fog box with given depth and color.
